attributes.action: Scrap proposals for MPs to claim any new bin tax as an expense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst planning to introduce additional taxes on household waste which will hit hardworking families and householders, at the same time MPs are planning to exempt themselves from any such charge by claiming this as an expense. If MPs are prepared to introduce this type of additional tax, they should be expected to pay this themselves also and not abuse public funds in this way

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
